snippet.title: EarthTongue Trailer
snippet.description:
http://erichermit.itch.io/earth-tongue

Earthtongue is a fungal viviarium sim that places you in the limited control of an ecosystem of bugs and fungi. Your subtle nudges will be needed to create a world that truly flourishes and to stave off life's extinction.

Earthtongue is releasing Jan 5th for Mac and PC

Song by DWOBoyle (https://twitter.com/DWOBoyle)
Trailer by Mari (https://www.youtube.com/user/GeekRemix + https://twitter.com/GeekRemix)
